resources.string: 1) The club is organised into number of teams. Each team is identified by unique name (team id)
2) Each team is owner by a single owner or many owners (Identified by owner_id)
3) Each team consists of one or more coaches having their own speciality and unique id
4) The team consists of no of players. Each player is identified by unique name (player_id)
5) Every single player has physical fitness checked b height and weight of player and identified by unique fitness_id having corresponding fitness_value
6) Each player has specific status(playing status identified by unique status_id)
